Your bag seems to be empty and you are probably hungry. Look at our fresh special offers , you would like it. check it out Our Story What does the Chef cook up in his kitchen? Welcome to Chef Eleven, here we specialize in creating, producing, and distributing premium seasonings, spices, and blends that enhance the flavor of every dish. From authentic Southern cuisine to classic American favorites, our products cater to families, retailers, distributors, and institutional customers nationwide. With over a decade of passion and expertise, we've perfected our recipes to ensure each meal is bursting with deliciousness. Whether you're cooking for loved ones at home or serving guests at an event, ChefEleven is your trusted partner in culinary excellence. Join us on a flavorful journey and elevate your cooking experience with ChefEleven's exceptional ingredients. 0 + Years of Experiences 0 K+ Customer Reviews Premium Ingredients Chef Eleven's products are crafted using high-quality ingredients to ensure superior flavor and culinary excellence in every bite. Trusted Quality With over a decade of expertise and a commitment to excellence, Chef Eleven is the trusted choice for discerning cooks everywhere. Versatile Range From seasoning mixes to specialty marinades, our diverse product line offers endless possibilities for elevating your culinary creations. INSTAGRAM let’s have a look what is behind the scenes MORE INFO FAQ About Us Terms and Condition Contact Us FOLLOW US Facebook Instagram CONTACT INFO Chef9eleven@gmail.com 678-524-8711 Chef Eleven Altanta, GA, USA TOP PICKS Chef Eleven All Purpose Seasoning Chef Eleven Vegan Seasoning © 2025, Chef Eleven . Breakfast, Lunch, Coffee, Tea, Afternoon Tea - 11 Coffee & Co. 11 Coffee & Co. Homestyle Deli CafÃ© In house or take away Since 2015 11 Queens Parade London W5 3HU 020 8991 1457 321 Upper Richmond Road West London SW14 8QR 020 8876 7203 HELLO! We are more than your normal coffee shop; we are a part of your everyday lives.  Our passion and love of home-cooked meal is portrayed in every dish we serve. Come and choose from our heartily and healthy all day brunch, sexy salads or good old fashioned specials with a taste of Persia.  We have excellent coffee, speciality teas and an array of freshly pressed juices and smoothies.  And last but by far not the least, we have freshly baked cakes which will put a smile on your face. OUR MENU Ealing East Sheen OUR STORY I started my first coffee shop in 2004 in Hampstead Garden Suburbs after deciding to give up my 9 to 5 job in the city. With no catering experience, the only way I knew how to operate a business was NOT to look at it as a business. I treated it like my home and all the customers were guests in my home. After 13 years, I still stand by the same principle as I have not yet learnt the art of the business but have mastered the art of being a host. We buy the best fresh ingredients and cook the food I serve to my family at home. Everything is freshly cooked on site and served immediately to our guests. CATERING SERVICES A voyage in the tastes and perfumes of the Silk Roadâ¦ Persia on a platter. Reinventing Persian family recipes with subtle and varied flavours for an exotic Persian taste. Whatever your special occasion, from family dinners to corporate events and galleries to weddings, we can cater to make a memorable experience for everyone involved. Just call us and we can discuss your needs to create a playful and elegant Persian feast. We can also bake a speciality cake for your occasion.  Let us know if you need a chef to assemble the canapes or if you need servers.  Everything is possible. Get In Touch Party Menu CanapÃ©s Menu Get In Touch OUR CAKES One of the best things about 11 Coffee & Co are the cakes that are baked by our wonderful baker with plenty of passion and love. We use only the best quality ingredients that you expect to find in home baked cakes. NO ADDITIVES NO PRESERVATIVES and NO COLOURING is the motto we live by. We also always try to have a gluten free and vegan option on display for those guests with special dietary requirements. If you need a whole cake or a bespoke homemade celebration cake, just get in touch to discuss your wishes. Mon-Fri: 7:30-17:00 Sat: 8:00-17:00 Sun & Public Holidays: 9:00-16:00 We are now closed! Mon-Fri: 7:30-17:00 Sat: 8:00-17:00 Sun & Public Holidays: 9:00-16:00 We are now closed! Mon-Fri: 7:30-17:00 Sat: 8:00-17:00 Sun & Public Holidays: 9:00-16:00 We are open & Serving! OUR SHOPS Ealing 11 Queens Parade London W5 3HU 020 8991 1457 info@11coffee.co.uk Mon-Fri: 7:30-17:00 Sat: 8:00-17:00 Sun & Public Holidays: 9:00-16:00 We are open & Serving! Boston’s Only Board Game Cafe & Bar - Tavern of Tales Book Now (617) 708 - 0172 Cart 0 Menu Events How to Play Members FAQ Contact/Jobs Reservations STORE Cart 0 Menu Events How to Play Members FAQ Contact/Jobs Reservations STORE Cafe & Bar Scroll Tavern of Tales Cafe & Bar Booking Info Food & Drink Menus Co-Working Office Hours Three Ways to Play Join an event Participate in any of our regular events such as weekly board game meetups, drop-in drop-out D&D campaigns, casual Commander, and trivia night. View events Rent a room Rent out our private rooms to gain access to our expanded library of board games. Each room is fully sound proofed for your experience and servers will stop by to take your orders or deliver food! Reserve ahead Free play Get access to our shelf of free board games curated by our team. Great for large parties and quick to learn. How to play Recurring Events Dungeons & Dragons Come enjoy D&D in our private sound proof rooms. Each room comes with an audio system to experience your campaigns in an immersive new way. Looking to join a campaign? Our D&D Discord Community is the place to look for campaign info! Magic the Gathering From our own in-house Magic league to Pre Release events we host all kinds of Magic events and sell products in store or online. Come join our growing Magic the Gathering community for Commander on Wednesday & Saturday. Tavern Trivia General trivia brought to you every week with questions written by our own staff. Come and join in for your chance at prizes! Event Schedule D&D Community Campaigns Join your fellow adventurers at Tavern of Tales, Join Discord to participate in our monthly Dungethon or join pop up volunteer one shots! Tavern Trivia Thursdays Trivia Thursday’s are back at Boston’s only board game bar! Join us every Thursday starting at 7:30pm for Trivia. Bring your best team of 4 and compete for some cool prizes! Board Game Meetup Looking for other people to play your favorite table top games? Make use of our lovely game rooms and meet other members of Boston's Tabletop community every Tuesday evening. We even host Game Dev Showcases where local game devs from the Game Maker’s Guild will showcase their new games! Casual Commander Our Magic Community is very welcoming and you can find all power levels here at the table from precon commander decks to CEDH. Wednesdays 5pm-11pm & Saturdays 10am-4pm Tavern of Tales Discord Join an ever growing community of table top gamers, dice rollers, card shufflers and eSports pros located in the Boston and Mission Hill area. Join the Discord Gift Cards for the Ultimate Game Night Treat your friends, family, and loved ones to a memorable experience at Tavern of Tales, where they can explore our diverse collection of board games. Create cherished moments, connect with others, and make any occasion special. Get your gift cards today! Visit Shop Tavern of Tales Reviews Great board game bar, great signature drinks and very knowledgeable staff. You'll wanna revisit to try the whole menu! Huffenstein The staff is so friendly! They help pick out games to play and can explain the rules. The drinks and food are fantastic too! Emily Tons of board games, card games, and games like D&D and MTG for those interested, just an overall fantastic spot. Alyssa B Super cool place that offers lots of different events & games. There are always people meeting up here to play MTG, D&D, etc. Michael Laccavole Really wonderful place to go and hangout to play some board games or D&D. Great drinks, great food and the absolute best staff. Erin M Awesome space for game enthusiasts of all kinds. Friendly, cool ownership and staff, consistent events, active Discord channels, and great food and drinks. Eric E Frequently Asked Questions Is there a time / table limit? Friday-Sunday (and any time we are at/near capacity) we have a 90 minute time/table limit for the cafe and bar area. No reservation is required to come to our cafe and play games from our shelf. You will need a reservation for a private room, which can be made at this link within 1 hour of an open reservation slot. Is there an age limit at Tavern of Tales? No However, any person under 18 years of age must be accompanied by an adult at all times. Can I bring my dog? Yes! We have a dog friendly outdoor patio. Your dog must be up to date on their vaccinations and rabies shots, and must be able to prove this if asked. We are unable to accomodate animals inside, so do keep the weather in mind. We are unable to provide water dishes, but can fill yours up if you bring your own! Service dogs that are trained to assist people with disabilities are permitted on licensed establishments. Please note emotional support animals and pets do not qualify as service animals. For more information, please visit this link . Unfortunately no dogs are allowed in the indoor space except for trained service dogs. The host may ask you what service your dog is trained to provide. Emotional support animals are not allowed indoors at Tavern of Tales. What types of ID do you accept? As per the City of Boston , the only forms of acceptable ID at any establishment serving or selling alcohol are as follows: A Massachusetts Driver’s License; A Massachusetts Liquor Identification Card; A Massachusetts Identification Card; A Passport Issued by the United States or a government that is officially recognized by the United States; A Passport Card for a Passport issued by the United States; and A Military Identification Card. Are reservations required? Reservations are not necessary, but we highly encourage groups to reserve rooms as a way to skip the waitlist and guarantee your spot during peak times. Visit https://www.tavernoftales.com/reservations to start your booking. For parties of 7 or more, contact info@tavernoftales.com to save your spot. Dress Code & Body Hygeine Policy We want every guest to enjoy a comfortable, welcoming experience. To ensure the comfort of all, we ask that guests follow a few simple guidelines regarding attire and personal hygiene: We are a casual dining establishment — jeans, t-shirts, sneakers, and other relaxed attire are perfectly acceptable. We do ask that clothing be clean and presentable (no excessive rips, stains, or offensive graphics). For safety reasons, shirts and shoes are required at all times. To provide a pleasant atmosphere for all guests, we ask that visitors maintain reasonable personal hygiene. Excessive or unpleasant odors — whether from clothing, poor hygiene, or strong fragrances — may disrupt the dining experience for others. Freshly laundered clothing and use of deodorant are strongly encouraged. Please avoid wearing heavy perfumes, colognes, or sprays, as these may affect the comfort of nearby guests. Our goal is to create a welcoming environment for everyone. We ask that all attire and grooming reflect consideration for fellow diners. Guests who do not meet these standards may be respectfully asked to leave or return at another time. This is at the discretion of restaurant management and staff to ensure the comfort of all diners. We appreciate your cooperation and understanding in helping us keep Tavern of Tales enjoyable for all. Banner image card section what We offer new-events-section discord section New Page review section faq-section Location 1478 Tremont St Boston, MA 02120 Phone (617) 708-0172 Hours Monday: 10am-10pm Tuesday: 10am-10pm Wednesday: 10am-10pm Thursday: 10am-10pm Friday: 10am-10pm Saturday: 10am-10pm Sunday: 10am-9pm Menus Drinks Food Brunch Experience How to Play Magic the Gathering Dungeons & Dragons Trivia Thursdays Make a Reservation Leave us a Review © 2025 Tavern of Tales All Rights Reserved (617) 708-0172 Hours Members Menu Contact Us

About Us & Our Friendly Catering Team | Babbacombe Bay Cafe Skip to content Home Menus Afternoon Tea Outside Catering Gallery About Us Social Media News Contact Menu Book Now Book About Us We love to leave a lasting impression with our visitors knowing that they will always receive a warm and friendly welcome. We use the best local ingredients from our suppliers who are an integral part of the team. We are known for our delicious coffee, which is triple certified, fair-trade and organic. Our chefs and catering team have a wealth of knowledge and experience. Each chef offers their own passion and talent. To complement our food, we sell a variety of Devon produced alcohol including cider, beer and an extensive selection of gins. We understand that some of our visitors have special dietary requirements which we do our upmost to accommodate. Doggies & Places of Interest We love our well behaved four-legged friends, who are welcome at Babbacombe Bay Café, and can enjoy a little doggie treat or two. Outside Catering We can offer catering for a variety of special occasions.  With over 20 years extensive experience, we can help create a menu to suit any event. Vouchers Indulge with a lasting memory for friends and loved ones.
Our personalised vouchers can be purchased for any amount and are valid for 12 months.
You can choose to have your voucher delivered in our beautiful gift packaging, or via email. Opening Hours Monday to Sunday 9am-5pm Last hot food service 3.30pm, drinks, scones & cakes 4.30pm Eat & Drink Breakfast Menu Lunch Menu Drinks Menu Afternoon Teas All Menus Outside Catering About Us Doggie Friendly Gift Vouchers Find Us 33-35 Babbacombe Downs Rd, Babbacombe, Torquay TQ1 3LN 33-35 Babbacombe Downs Rd, Babbacombe, Torquay TQ1 3LN Get In Touch 01803 658794 Email Us Follow Us Facebook Instagram Tripadvisor © 2025 Babbacombe Bay Cafe. About Us – Eleven Hospitality Group Skip to content Menu Close Back Suite of Services About Us Our Brands Our Story Our Team Our Locations In the News Gallery Contact Login Facebook Instagram Twitter Email Close 0 products in your cart 0 Total: $0.00 Shipping & taxes calculated at checkout View Cart Update cart Checkout Continue browsing Our Brands Eleven Hospitality Group operates a collection of award-winning hospitality concepts throughout the United States. Rooted in delivering greatness and intentional in creating memorable experiences, we endeavor for our concepts to bring joy, delight and a unique culinary event every time. We invite you to meet our brands below: Our Story We are rooted in family and our origins are about making memories. Chef and CEO, Cory Harwell, grew up in Woodstock, GA, where he learned to cook by the age of 10 under the watchful eye of his mom and grandmother. With this spirit, Eleven Hospitality Group was created to share the sentiment of "family and celebration.” We draw inspiration from the best memories of our lives and share them with our guests, our team members, our vendors and our communities. Our Values Our entire EHG team is trustworthy, genuine and self-aware - recognizing when we succeed when we fail and what we can do better. ✦ Respect ✦ Boldness ✦ Authenticity ✦ Greatness We endeavor to extend this to our guests, our vendors, our communities, as well as to our team. Our Verticals ✦  High-end Restaurants ✦  Casual-style Restaurants ✦  Breakfast-style Restaurants ✦  Artisanal Market ✦  Chef-driven Catering ✦  Commissary Kitchen ✦  Nightlife Lounge ✦  Attraction/Event Spaces Suite of Services With more than 30 years of immersive experience creating, debuting, managing and scaling award-winning restaurant and hospitality concepts, Eleven Hospitality Group knows how to build the roadmap, the tool kit and engage in best practices – and we want to share it. We proudly partner with emerging and established restaurant groups for 360-degree culinary support for you to go live and thrive. Learn more about our suite of essential services to take your concept from a seed of an idea to an IRL (in real life) experience. SUITES LISTED BELOW. Our Team Respect. Boldness. Engagement. Empowerment. Authenticity. Opinions. Love. Our entire Eleven Hospitality Group team believes in being great. We are rooted in our belief that we can change how you eat – and we love that. Heart, knowledge and intention go into each and every dish and it’s the team behind our concepts that is bringing this to you - daily. Meet our team of culinary change agents and food lovers Cory Harwell President David English VP, Director of Project Development Andrew Weintraub VP, Restaurants Cyndi Arons Director of Finance Rachel Tate Director of Operations CONTACT OUR TEAM Kind Words from Our Guests "Could not have asked for better execution. My wife and I will forever cherish the memory of our wedding day and could not be more grateful to the Carson Kitchen team for hosting us." Arjun C. | June 2022 Carson Kitchen Las Vegas "Insanity. We had the bacon jam, killer shrimp, devils eggs, & crispy chicken skins for the appetizer. Unreal! Word needs to be spread, this is the best food in the state no questions asked." Matt C. | May 2022 Carson Kitchen Salt Lake City "Service was phenomenal!! Our server was attentive and helpful and knowledgeable on each dish. It was plenty of food to share between 2-3 people easily." Mhaliene M. | May 2022 Carson Kitchen Atlanta "Highly recommend taking the short walk from city center to dine at this truly well-thought-out, professionally run, unpretentious yet subtly classy restaurant. We put it right up there as one of our top dining experiences (and we travel and dine a lot)." Dana C. | April 2022 Carson Kitchen Salt Lake City "This place has always been one of my favorite places and is probably my number one spot in downtown. Great atmosphere with great food. The staff is always so friendly too!" Next Level Welcome All! Browse our selection of over 600 games, join our monthly events, and become a part of the Next Level Community. Enjoy our fresh and delicious food, coffee, wine, and our selection of craft beers, brought right to your table. Plan Your Visit We are located at 888 Villa St, Mountain View, CA 94041 Opening Hours: Tuesday-Wednesday 5-10PM Thursday-Sunday 10AM-10PM Upcoming Special Hours: Closed Tuesday September 9 for private event About Us Next Level is Downtown Mountain View's first board game cafe. Our mission is to create a community space for board game enthusiasts of all ages and experience levels. We have a massive selection of board games for hours of entertainment for you, your friends, your enemies, and everyone between. We guarantee a fun time whatever the occasion. Not sure where to start? Our friendly staff is ready to help make recommendations and teach you the basics of your next favorite game. If you loved what you played, stop by our retail section to take the fun home with you. How It Works A $7 entry fee gives you access to our games library for as long as you like. With over 600 games to choose from, we have something for everyone! If you've never played any board games or want to try something new, our friendly staff can make recommendations and guide you through your first games. Let the Games Begin! With our wide selection, there's always something new for everyone. If you spot something you'd like to try, let us know and we can teach you. We can save you the awkward part of waiting for one person to read the manual, while the rest twiddle their thumbs. We aim to know as many games as we can so you can start having fun faster. Our Games Shop Around Looking for a gift or a new addition to your personal collection? We have a variety of fan favorite games for sale in our retail area. Our staff is always here to help if you need suggestions. Connect with our Community We host regular social board game meetups and events. Come check us out and meet some new board game friends. You can also connect with our board game community on our Discord server to organize games and chat! Join our Discord Lunch Or Dinner Sorted We know what it's like to be hours into a game of Catan and need a snack. We have sandwiches delivered hot and fresh to your table, fresh house made salads, desserts and a variety of other options. Keep In Touch Sign up for our mailing list to get the latest updates, information about us, and our monthly events. You can also follow us on Instagram for Facebook for updates. Email Get updates Copyright © 2025 Next Level Board Game Cafe - All Rights Reserved. Powered by Menu This website uses cookies. We analyze traffic to improve our website and services. We don't sell or share your data. Accept
